actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of July 15, 1968 (82 Stat. 356) P.L.90-401 to include units of the National Forest System within the provisions of the Act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the sale through competitive bidding of freehold and leasehold interests in national forest system lands administered by the Secretary of Agriculture. Credits the proceeds received from any conveyance of national park system or national forest system lands by the Secretary of the Interior or by the Secretary of Agriculture to land acquisition appropriations for such areas.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of July 15, 1968 (82 Stat. 356) P.L.90-401 to include units of the National Forest System within the provisions of the Act, and for other purposes.
